analysis.description:
CryptoLotto._saveLottoResult (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1355-1387) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(_ownerShare) (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1379)
usingOraclize.getCodeSize (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#617-621) is declared view but contains assembly code
usingOraclize.copyBytes (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#956-977) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in usingOraclize.oraclizeAPI (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#73-82):
	External calls:
	- address(oraclize) != OAR.getAddress() (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#77-82)
	- oraclize = OraclizeI(OAR.getAddress()) (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#81-82)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oraclize (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#81-82)
_isTaken in CryptoLotto.getBetting (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1604-1605) is a local variable never initialiazed
_index in CryptoLotto.getMyUntakenPrizes (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1743-1744) is a local variable never initialiazed

CryptoLotto._setLottoNumbers (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1318-1355) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-slicedString.beyond({{.toSlice()).until(}.toSlice()) (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1327)

Reentrancy in CryptoLotto._startLotto (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1305-1315):
	External calls:
	- oracleCallbackId = oraclize_query(duration,oraclizedQuerySource,oraclizedQuery,gasForOraclizedQuery) (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1308-1310)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isLottoStarted (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1310)
	- nonces (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1314)
	- numBonusMatchWinners (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1312-1313)
	- numFiveMatchWinners (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1311)
	- numSixMatchWinners (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1314)

Reentrancy in usingOraclize.oraclize_newRandomDSQuery (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#774-798):
	External calls:
	- sessionKeyHash_bytes32 = oraclize_randomDS_getSessionPubKeyHash() (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#780-783)
	- queryId = oraclize_query(_delay,random,args,_customGasLimit) (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#794-796)
	External calls sending eth:
	- queryId = oraclize_query(_delay,random,args,_customGasLimit) (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#794-796)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oraclize_network_name (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#794-796)
	- oraclize_randomDS_args (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#796-798)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.14', '^0.4.18']
	- /unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#34-35 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
	- /unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1065-1066 declares pragma solidity^0.4.14

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#34-35): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.14 (/unique_contracts/0x9bf82c025f57f4a94e567204c811e0d5db6350a2.sol#1065-1066): it allows old versions
